description:
Hougetsu Asumi is http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta]`s classmate at school. She is a good student and is cool tempered.
Despite not being one of Kyouta`s many groupies she is often dragged to his shows by her unlikely friend http://anidb.net/ch5907 [Kiriko]. Asumi never talked to Kyouta in class before but after Kiriko asked her to get her an autograph of Kyouta the events lead to them getting closer.
name: Hougetsu Asumi
